name: The Thirteenth Damned Son
description:
For the Folk-Lore Game Jam for Mork Borg https://itch.io/jam/flk-lore

This is my first ever project I've really put up for anything and I am beyond nervous. I've never really been able to just complete anything and put it up so I'm hoping this horrible little first attempt is a suitable sacrifice to the Dark Old Gods of Inspiration and Creation. 

Feedback is encouraged. Please, Flay me. 

The Thirteenth Damned Son is an independent production by Overlord Publishing and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.

MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
